summary: Fixed drakishar\'s Dynasty CBBEv3 meshes so normal maps display correctly.
descriptionHtml:
[u]Description:[/u]
This is a replacement of some meshes from drakishar\'s [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=6166]CBBE - CHSBHC - Dynasty Armor[/url] mod.

In drakishar\'s mod, the CBBEv3 meshes did not have the normal maps applied correctly.  I have fixed that.  Now you no longer need to fall back on the CBBEv2 version in order to have a high quality appearance.  (See the image for a comparison.)

I have included both chain and plain versions.  The boots did not need fixing, but I also included drakishar\'s boot meshes for the sake of completion.

[u]Requirements:[/u]
drakishar\'s [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=6166]CBBE - CHSBHC - Dynasty Armor[/url] mod or other Dynasty Armor mod that uses the same texture paths.

[u]Installation:[/u]
1) Back up your current Dynasty Armor meshes.  They will likely be found in Data\\meshes\\armor\\Dynasty.
2) Overwrite your meshes with the files found here.  
3) Rename as necessary.

[u]Optional:[/u]
By request, added my personal ESP file that utilizes a helmet/crown for the armor bonus.  I personally use the [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=5803]Dragonscale Crown[/url] by pnkrd, but you\'ll have to get the meshes yourself because permission is not automatically granted.  When you do, name them helmetf_0.nif and helmetf_1.nif in the Dynasty folder.  This ESP was actually modified from the original Skyrim [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=5733]Dynasty Armor[/url] mod by codecrackerx9.

[u]Permission:[/u]
Feel free to use these files as you wish.  I would be interested in hearing about any improvements you make to them.

[u]Credit:[/u]
Thanks to drakishar for the first CBBEv3 Dynasty Armor meshes!
Thanks to all the people drakishar thanked!
author: Vypir
